Description:
Coordinate product, event, or content email marketing campaigns, including copy, scheduling, testing, and database management.
Development and management of various marketing programs, like content and social media marketing.
Continuous tracking and assessment of the campaign performance and providing necessary reports with the metrics in mind.
Examining the existing marketing initiatives as well as executing various new marketing campaigns successfully.Skills
Skills:
